process

writing

action shot courtesy of my advisor, JP deRuiter :)

Whenever I am developing a new project, regardless of whether it is a painting or a website, I start out by taking notes and journaling. I like to organize new information on paper and in my memory as it comes to me, so I take notes at virtually every meeting or lecture I'm present for. Especially in my art practice, writing out what I'm feeling helps me check in with my instincts and start the process of making informed decisions about the project.

asking

notes from a hackathon project

As an artist, Whenever I am developing a new project, regardless of whether it is a painting or a website, I start out by taking notes and journaling. I like to organize new information on paper and in my memory as it comes to me, so I take notes at virtually every meeting or lecture I'm present for. Especially in my art practice, writing out what I'm feeling helps me check in with my instincts and start the process of making informed decisions about the project.

sketching

logo design spread I asked my WIT marketing team members to critique

implementing & iterating

JumboVote logo in Sketch
